mpls_schema.description: Specifies the multi-protocol label switching protocol.

global.description: Configure the multi-protocol label switching protocol global attributes.

lsr-id.description: MPLS LSR ID. If the MPLS LSR ID uses the primary IP address of the loopback interface, the loopback interface cannot be deleted.

null-lable-type.description: Specifies a null label type. 1. Implicit null label: This type of labels can be popped by using the Penultimate Hop Popping (PHP) feature. The end node assigns an implicit null label 3 to the penultimate node. 2. Explicit null label: This type of labels cannot be popped by using the PHP feature. The end node assigns the explicit null label 0 to the penultimate node. 3. Null label unsupported: The PHP feature cannot be used to pop a label. The end node assigns a non-null label whose value is equal to or larger than 16 to the penultimate node.

diff-serv-mode.description: Specifies the diffserv mode for MPLS.

sr-exp-mode.description: Specifies the EXP mode for SR. The value can be pipe or uniform.

te-ttl-mode.description: Specifies the TTL mode for RSVP TE.

ldp-ttl-mode.description: Specifies the TTL mode for LDP.

ftn-delay-time.description: Specifies the FEC to NHLFE tunnel delay time.

bit-err-levels.description: List of the config for bit error level information.

cross-connect.description: Operational data of a cross connection.

ilm-label-stacks.description: List of incoming label map (ILM) label stacks.

ilm-label-stack.description: Operational data of incoming label map (ILM) label stack.

out-label.description: Outgoing label. The name is case-insensitive.

out-interface-name.description: Outbound interface name.

ingress-lsp.description: Specifies the number of LSPs whose ingresses are the local node.

egress-lsp.description: Specifies the number of LSPs whose egresses are the local node.

transit-lsp.description: Specifies the number of LSPs whose transit nodes are the local node.

total-lsp.description: Specifies the total number of LSPs.

tcp.description: Configure LDP session CAR to limit TCP packets receive from peer.

udp-local.description: Configure LDP session CAR to limit UDP packets receive from local adjacency.

udp-remote.description: Configure LDP session CAR to limit UDP packets receive from targeted adjacency.

ldp.description: Configure LDP, query and modify LDP Configuration information.

lsp-trigger-mode.description: Specifies a triggering mode for establishing LSPs by LDP. The value can be: 1. All mode (in which LDP is triggered by all static routes and IGP routes to establish LSPs); 2. Host mode (in which LDP is triggered by 32- or 128-bit IP routes to establish LSPs); 3. None mode (in which LDP is not triggered to establish LSPs); 4. IP-prefix mode (in which LDP is triggered by the IP address prefix list to establish LSPs.

lsp-ip-prefix-name.description: Specifies or clear the IP prefix triggering mode, LDP is triggered to establish or to clear LSPs by IP address prefixes.

bgp-label.description: Enable/disable of triggering LDP alloc label for BGP label route.

bgp-ip-prefix-name.description: Trigger policy when LDP alloc label for BGP label route.

bgp-not-only-host.description: Enable/disable LDP to allocate labels for labeled BGP routes with non-32-bit masks.

global.description: Configure global LDP. Query and modify global LDP parameters.

gr-enable.description: Enable/disable LDP GR capability. Enabling or disabling of GR will cause the re-establishment of all LDP sessions.

reconnect-time.description: Specifies the value of the LDP session reconnection timer.

recovery-time.description: Specifies the value of the LSP recovery timer.

peer-live-time.description: Specifies the value of the neighbor keeplive timer.

trap-session-rlfa-disable.description: Enable/disable a device from generating traps when LDP sessions go down due to RLFA route deletion.

gr-no-delete-flag.description: Enable/disable the modification of GR parameters, it will not affect established sessions, but only affect new created sessions.

back-off-init-time.description: Specifies the init value of the exponential backoff timer.

back-off-max-time.description: Specifies the maximum value of the exponential backoff timer.

ecmp-frr-coexist-enable.description: Enable/disable ECMP And FRR Coexist Capability.

mldp.description: Configure MLDP. Query and modify MLDP parameters.

p2mp.description: Configure MLDP P2MP. Query and modify MLDP P2MP parameters.

mbb-traffic-detect.description: Enable/disable MLDP MBB P2MP traffic detect.

mbb-wait-ack-time.description: MLDP MBB ACK Notification Wait Time.

p2mp-link-frr-enable.description: Enable/disable MLDP P2MP Frr Link Proteciton.

leaf-lsps.description: List of MLDP P2MP leaf LSPs.

root-ip.description: MLDP P2MP leaf LSP root IP address.

tunnel.description: Configure MLDP P2MP tunnel. The max-elements is controlled by the PAF.

root-ip.description: MLDP P2MP tunnel root IP address.

lsp.description: Operational data of MLDP P2MP LSP.

root-ip.description: MLDP P2MP LSP root IP address.

insegments.description: List of MLDP P2MP LSP insegments.

insegment.description: Operational state of MLDP P2MP LSP insegment information.

outsegments.description: List of MLDP P2MP LSP outsegments.

outsegment.description: Operational state of MLDP P2MP LSP outsegment information.

out-interface-name.description: Outbound interface name.

next-hop.description: LSP next-hop IP address.

flows.description: List of MLDP P2MP lsp traffic statistics.

root-ip.description: MLDP P2MP lsp traffic statistics root IP address.

outsegment-number.description: Number of mLDP P2MP lsp traffic statistics outsegments.

outsegments.description: List of mLDP P2MP lsp traffic statistics outsegments.

outsegment.description: Statistics of MLDP P2MP lsp traffic outsegment information.

out-interface-name.description: Outbound interface name.

next-hop.description: LSP next-hop IP address.

total-byte.description: MLDP P2MP lsp traffic statistics total byte.

total-packet.description: MLDP P2MP lsp traffic statistics total packet.

bfd.description: Configure dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

fec-lists.description: List of FECs. Config FEC list for dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.Fec list can only create one.

fec-list.description: Configure FEC list for dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

name.description: Config FEC list for the FEC list of name dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

fec-nodes.description: List of FEC nodes' infos. Config FEC nodes for the FEC list of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP. Keys in different lists cannot be the same.

address.description: Configure only IP address for FEC node of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

ip-address.description: Config IP address for FEC node of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

address-interface.description: Configure FEC node for FEC list of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

ip-address.description: Config IP address for FEC node of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

out-interface-name.description: Config the out interface for FEC node of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.The name is case-insensitive.

address-nexthop.description: Configure FEC node for FEC list of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

ip-address.description: Config IP address for FEC node of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

next-hop.description: Config the next hop for FEC node of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

address-interface-nexthop.description: Configure FEC node for FEC list of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

ip-address.description: Config IP address for FEC node of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

out-interface-name.description: Config the out interface for FEC node of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.The name is case-insensitive.

next-hop.description: Config the next hop for FEC node of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

enable.description: Enable/disable dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

detect-multiplier.description: Maximum number of allowed dropped BFD packets. When BFD is enabled for an LDP LSP, a BFD session can be set up. If the number of lost BFD messages exceeds the maximum number of allowed dropped BFD packets, the LDP LSP is considered faulty.

feclist-name.description: Configure LDP BFD triggered by a FEC list name.

next-hop-address.description: When trigger policy is host, we could set next hop address, which of the LSP will be create BFD sessions, and others will not.

out-interface-name.description: When trigger policy is host, we could set out or clear up interface, which of the LSP will be create or clear BFD sessions, and others will not. The name is case-insensitive.

trigger-opt-tlv.description: Enable/disable BFD For LDP LSP Option Tlv.

opt-tlv-ip-prefix-name.description: IP Prefix of BFD Compatible Mode.

trigger-tunnel.description: Config Trigger Mode of BFD For LDP Tunnel Policy.

tunnel-ip-prefix-name.description: Config IP Prefix of BFD For LDP Tunnel.

tunnel-feclist-name.description: Configure BFD For LDP Tunnel triggered by a FEC list name, the sepcified FEC list including the FEC node with outgoing interface must be Invalid0 and next hop information must be 0.0.0.0.

tunnel-min-tx.description: BFD sending interval For LDP Tunnel.

tunnel-min-rx.description: BFD receiving interval For LDP Tunnel.

tunnel-detect-multiplier.description: Maximum number of allowed dropped BFD packets. When BFD is enabled for an LDP LSP, a BFD session can be set up. If the number of lost BFD messages exceeds the maximum number of allowed dropped BFD packets, the LDP LSP is considered faulty.

mldp.description: Configure dynamic BFD for MLDP P2MP Tunnel.

enable.description: Enable/disable dynamic BFD for MLDP P2MP Tunnel.

p2mp-tunnel-dm.description: Maximum number of allowed dropped BFD packets. When BFD is enabled for an MLDP P2MP Tunnel, a BFD session can be set up. If the number of lost BFD messages exceeds the maximum number of allowed dropped BFD packets, the MLDP P2MP Tunnel is considered faulty.

p2mp-tunnel-trigger.description: Config P2MP Tunnel BFD Trigger Policy.

sessions.description: List of all the sessions of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

session.description: Operational data of a session information of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

fec-address.description: Show the FEC address of the session of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

out-interface-name.description: Show the out interface of the BFD session which is created by a LDP LSP, and the out interface is the LDP LSP's out interface. The name is case-insensitive.

next-hop.description: Show the next hop of the BFD session which is created by a LDP LSP, and the next hop is the LDP LSP's next hop.

lsp-index.description: Show the LSP index of the BFD session which is created by a LDP LSP, and the LSP index is the LDP LSP's next hop.

discriminator.description: Show the BFD discriminator of the BFD session of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

session-state.description: Show the BFD session state of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

min-tx-int.description: Show BFD sending interval of the BFD session of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP. The value is expressed in milliseconds.

min-rx-int.description: Show BFD receiving interval of the BFD session of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP. The value is expressed in milliseconds.

detect-multi.description: Show BFD detect multiplier of the BFD session of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

session-age.description: Show the BFD session age of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

tunnel-sessions.description: List of all the sessions of BFD For LDP Tunnel.

tunnel-session.description: Operational data of a session information of BFD For LDP Tunnel.

fec-address.description: Show the FEC address of the session of BFD For LDP Tunnel.

lsp-index.description: Show the LSP index of the BFD session which is created by a LDP LSP, and the LSP index is the LDP LSP's next hop.

discriminator.description: Show the BFD discriminator of the BFD session of BFD For LDP Tunnel.

session-state.description: Show the BFD session state of BFD For LDP Tunnel.

min-tx-int.description: Show BFD sending interval of the BFD session of BFD For LDP Tunnel. The value is expressed in milliseconds.

min-rx-int.description: Show BFD receiving interval of the BFD session of BFD For LDP Tunnel. The value is expressed in milliseconds.

detect-multi.description: Show BFD detect multiplier of the BFD session of BFD For LDP Tunnel.

session-age.description: Show the BFD session age of BFD For LDP Tunnel.

local-number.description: Total number of LDP local adjacencies.

remote-number.description: Total number of LDP remote adjacencies.

local-number.description: Total number of LDP local peers.

remote-number.description: Total number of LDP remote peers.

local-remote-number.description: Total number of LDP local&remote peers.
Total number of LDP local&remote sessions.

bfd_schema.description: Configure dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

fec-lists.description: List of FECs. Config FEC list for dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.Fec list can only create one.

fec-list.description: Configure FEC list for dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

name.description: Config FEC list for the FEC list of name dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

fec-nodes.description: List of FEC nodes' infos. Config FEC nodes for the FEC list of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP. Keys in different lists cannot be the same.

address.description: Configure only IP address for FEC node of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

ip-address.description: Config IP address for FEC node of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

address-interface.description: Configure FEC node for FEC list of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

ip-address.description: Config IP address for FEC node of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

out-interface-name.description: Config the out interface for FEC node of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.The name is case-insensitive.

address-nexthop.description: Configure FEC node for FEC list of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

ip-address.description: Config IP address for FEC node of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

next-hop.description: Config the next hop for FEC node of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

address-interface-nexthop.description: Configure FEC node for FEC list of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

ip-address.description: Config IP address for FEC node of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

out-interface-name.description: Config the out interface for FEC node of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.The name is case-insensitive.

next-hop.description: Config the next hop for FEC node of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

enable.description: Enable/disable dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

detect-multiplier.description: Maximum number of allowed dropped BFD packets. When BFD is enabled for an LDP LSP, a BFD session can be set up. If the number of lost BFD messages exceeds the maximum number of allowed dropped BFD packets, the LDP LSP is considered faulty.

feclist-name.description: Configure LDP BFD triggered by a FEC list name.

next-hop-address.description: When trigger policy is host, we could set next hop address, which of the LSP will be create BFD sessions, and others will not.

out-interface-name.description: When trigger policy is host, we could set out or clear up interface, which of the LSP will be create or clear BFD sessions, and others will not. The name is case-insensitive.

trigger-opt-tlv.description: Enable/disable BFD For LDP LSP Option Tlv.

opt-tlv-ip-prefix-name.description: IP Prefix of BFD Compatible Mode.

trigger-tunnel.description: Config Trigger Mode of BFD For LDP Tunnel Policy.

tunnel-ip-prefix-name.description: Config IP Prefix of BFD For LDP Tunnel.

tunnel-feclist-name.description: Configure BFD For LDP Tunnel triggered by a FEC list name, the sepcified FEC list including the FEC node with outgoing interface must be Invalid0 and next hop information must be 0.0.0.0.

tunnel-min-tx.description: BFD sending interval For LDP Tunnel.

tunnel-min-rx.description: BFD receiving interval For LDP Tunnel.

tunnel-detect-multiplier.description: Maximum number of allowed dropped BFD packets. When BFD is enabled for an LDP LSP, a BFD session can be set up. If the number of lost BFD messages exceeds the maximum number of allowed dropped BFD packets, the LDP LSP is considered faulty.

mldp.description: Configure dynamic BFD for MLDP P2MP Tunnel.

enable.description: Enable/disable dynamic BFD for MLDP P2MP Tunnel.

p2mp-tunnel-dm.description: Maximum number of allowed dropped BFD packets. When BFD is enabled for an MLDP P2MP Tunnel, a BFD session can be set up. If the number of lost BFD messages exceeds the maximum number of allowed dropped BFD packets, the MLDP P2MP Tunnel is considered faulty.

p2mp-tunnel-trigger.description: Config P2MP Tunnel BFD Trigger Policy.

sessions.description: List of all the sessions of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

session.description: Operational data of a session information of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

fec-address.description: Show the FEC address of the session of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

out-interface-name.description: Show the out interface of the BFD session which is created by a LDP LSP, and the out interface is the LDP LSP's out interface. The name is case-insensitive.

next-hop.description: Show the next hop of the BFD session which is created by a LDP LSP, and the next hop is the LDP LSP's next hop.

lsp-index.description: Show the LSP index of the BFD session which is created by a LDP LSP, and the LSP index is the LDP LSP's next hop.

discriminator.description: Show the BFD discriminator of the BFD session of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

session-state.description: Show the BFD session state of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

min-tx-int.description: Show BFD sending interval of the BFD session of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP. The value is expressed in milliseconds.

min-rx-int.description: Show BFD receiving interval of the BFD session of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP. The value is expressed in milliseconds.

detect-multi.description: Show BFD detect multiplier of the BFD session of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

session-age.description: Show the BFD session age of dynamic BFD for LDP LSP.

tunnel-sessions.description: List of all the sessions of BFD For LDP Tunnel.

tunnel-session.description: Operational data of a session information of BFD For LDP Tunnel.

fec-address.description: Show the FEC address of the session of BFD For LDP Tunnel.
